text: Baluna [1], ‘esa [2], tomadera raba tomadera upara ya harama karechena tomaderake ta tila'oyata kari, ta hacche, ‘tomara tamra sathe kono sarika karabe na [3], pitamatara prati sadbyabahara karabe [4], daridrera bhaye tomara tomadera santanadera hatya karabe na, amara'i tomaderake o taderake riyaka diye thaki [5]. Prakasye hoka kimba gopane hoka, aslila kajera dhare-kache'o yabe na [6]. Allah‌ yara hatya nisid'dha karechena yathartha karana chara tomara take hatya karabe na [7].’ Tomaderake tini e nirdesa dilena yena tomara bujhate para
